snippet: After a new book by former Defense Secretary Robert M. Gates described Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. as “wrong on nearly every major foreign policy and national security issue over the past four decades,” White House officials went out of...
abstract: White House officials go out of their way to praise Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr and extravagantly advertise his presence in the West Wing less than 24 hours after former Defense Secretary Robert M Gates book Duty describes Biden in unfavorable terms.
lead_paragraph: After a new book by former Defense Secretary Robert M. Gates described Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. as “wrong on nearly every major foreign policy and national security issue over the past four decades,” White House officials went out of their way to praise Mr. Biden.

headline.main: At White House, It’s Biden Everywhere After a Memoir’s Lashing
headline.print_headline: At White House, It’s Biden Everywhere After a Memoir’s Lashing

keywords.value: Duty: Memoirs of a Secretary at War (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works
